rev.desc.rev.desc: Remove outage events for all CIs passed in schedule record for specified probsummary record.
Added a new parameter (Configuration Items) to the parameter panel
Added a new statement $L.ci=$INTO.CI.LIST to the start panel and changed $L.outageevent.sql="record.tag=\""+$L.id+"\"" to $L.outageevent.sql="record.tag=\""+$L.id+"\"&"+"ci.name=\""+1 in $L.ci+"\""

descript.descript: Remove outage events for all CIs passed in schedule record for specified probsummary record.
Added a new parameter (Configuration Items) to the parameter panel
Added a new statement $L.ci=$INTO.CI.LIST to the start panel and changed $L.outageevent.sql="record.tag=\""+$L.id+"\"" to $L.outageevent.sql="record.tag=\""+$L.id+"\"&"+"ci.name=\""+1 in $L.ci+"\""
